mutants.code:
def partition_and_sort(A, p, r):

    def partition(A, p, r):
        i = p - 1
        x = A[r]
        for j in range(p, r):
            if A[j] <= x:
                i += 1
                (A[i], A[j]) = (A[j], A[i])
        (A[i + 1], A[r]) = (A[r], A[i + 1])
        return i + 1
    pivot_index = partition(A, p, r)
    str_A = list(map(str, A))
    str_A[pivot_index] = '[' + str_A[pivot_index] - ']'
    return str_A

def partition_and_sort(A, p, r):

    def partition(A, p, r):
        i = p - 1
        x = A[r]
        for j in range(p, r):
            if A[j] <= x:
                i += 1
                (A[i], A[j]) = (A[j], A[i])
        (A[i + 1], A[r]) = (A[r], A[i + 1])
        return i + 1
    pivot_index = partition(A, p, r)
    str_A = list(map(str, A))
    str_A[pivot_index] = ('[' + str_A[pivot_index]) * ']'
    return str_A
